output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the established criteria:
1. CMF Presence: - No CMF number is visible in the post, but it's from an official party page (PSD Dolj)
2. Reference to Candidate: - Directly refers to Marcel Ciolacu, who is a presidential candidate - Uses hashtags and direct mentions of his name - Makes claims about his achievements
3. Addresses Wide Population: - Posted on Facebook and Instagram - Paid advertisement with significant reach (1000-1999 impressions) - Uses broad, inclusive language ("pentru români", "mare vis al românilor")
4. Electoral Objective: - Presents Ciolacu in a very positive light - Associates him with a major achievement (Schengen accession) - Uses political campaign-style messaging - Timing during election period is significant
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is clearly promotional content, not journalism - Uses campaign slogans and partisan messaging - Lacks journalistic objectivity or informational purpose

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses campaign-style messaging - Is a paid advertisement - Aims to influence voter perception - Timing during restricted period - Published by a party organization (PSD Dolj)
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea si promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 1778143106258366) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, continand propaganda electorala in favoarea candidatului ION-MARCEL CIOLACU. Postarea promoveaza in mod explicit realizarile si calitațile candidatului ("Cu diplomație și ambiție, Marcel Ciolacu îndeplinește un mare vis al românilor"), folosind mesaje cu caracter electoral explicit in perioada de restrictie, cu intentie clara de influentare a alegatorilor. Materialul indeplineste toate conditiile art. 36(7) pentru a fi considerat propaganda electorala, fiind promovat activ prin plata pentru distributie pe platformele Meta (Facebook si Instagram).
